programme.title: Accidental Tourist
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern leaves his comfort zone as Ant and Dec send him to South Korea to face his fears by experiencing raw seafood, extreme acupuncture, and a nerve-wracking freedive.

programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.desc: Loose Women legends Denise Welch, Katie Piper and Sunetra Sarker head to the Costa Brava in Spain and compete to throw the best holiday there.

programme.title: Sara Davies Christmas Craft Off
programme.desc: Sara Davies puts Tameka Empson and Rosie Ramsey to the festive test with angels, tablescapes, bow-making and gift-wrapping accompanied by surprises and a party.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Trying to Lingo all the way are cousins Danny and Alison from London and Cambridge, Andy with his son Dave from Dundee, and married couple Sue and Jane from Hebden Bridge.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Its Davids turn to take on the Banker as Stephen Mulhern hosts the iconic game show with only one question.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Neil from Stockport, Sally from York, Keletso from Nottingham, Jonny from Walton-on-Thames and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Whats on Scotland at Christmas
programme.desc: Join Emma Cameron and Laura Boyd for this festive edition of the entertainment show including a special seasonal musical performance.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Moira is uneasy, Charity makes excuses, and Rubys luck changes.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Will celebrates his 16th birthday in a hotel room with Megan, Sally clashes with Joanie over a schedule conflict, and Dee-Dee is saddened when James fails to turn up to her meal.

programme.desc: Festive action-adventure comedy film. The North Poles head of security must save Santa.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: Sorry, I Didnt Know
programme.desc: Chizzy Akudolu hosts as Desiree Burch, Ria Hebden, Matt Richardson and Shazia Mirza join team leaders Richard Blackwood and Eddie Kadi to go on a tour of Black British history.

programme.title: Capitals Jingle Bell Ball 2025
programme.desc: Highlights from the UKs biggest Christmas party at The O2 London with artists including Ed Sheeran, Kylie Minogue, RAYE, Louis Tomlinson, Alex Warren and Jessie J.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James continues his adventure in Lancashire with top chef Lisa Allen, including a trip to a local buffalo farm thats producing some interesting cheese.

programme.title: John and Lisas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: John and Lisa simplify some traditional festive dishes that can be a bit tricky to get right with a menu that includes a gorgeous alternative to Christmas pudding.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning at Christmas
programme.desc: James serves up a festive feast for cycling superstar Sir Mark Cavendish and enjoys recipes from Lesley Waters, Ashley Palmer-Watts, and Richard Bertinet.

programme.title: Ainsleys Festive Flavours
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott returns to his festive kitchen and whips up Christmas cheer alongside Sara Davies, Josie Gibson, and Paul Ainsworth while Jonathan Phang also joins in the fun.

programme.title: John and Lisas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: John and Lisa have got Christmas covered with some classic dishes to serve up for the festive season that include two family recipes they cannot wait to share with us.

programme.title: Inside MandS at Christmas
programme.desc: An access-all-areas look inside MandS at Christmas 2025 uncovering secrets behind Colin the Caterpillars makeover, a spicy glazed turkey, and a multi-million-pound shop revamp.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.desc: Bond film. 007 looks into a North Korean terrorists plot involving a space weapon.

programme.title: The 1% Club Christmas Special 2024
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts a festive special with all the bells and whistles youd expect as 100 contestants hope to make the holiday season even more special by winning up to 100,000 pounds.
